## ACCEPT\_ORGANIZATION\_REQUEST\_MUTATION variable

This mutation used to accept the membership request for an organization. The mutation checks if the user, organization and membership request valid or not, if not throws an error and return error message, if they are valid the mutation add user in membership request as a member to the organization.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ACCEPT_ORGANIZATION_REQUEST_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/membership_request_mutations/accept_membership_request.js)
